title: Introduction to the File and Directory Entries API
summary: The File and Directory Entries API simulates a local file system that web apps can navigate around. You can develop apps that can read, write, and create files and directories in a sandboxed, virtual file system.
short_title: Introduction to the File and Directory Entries API
